Actions.Name: Unstable Reality
Actions.Description: Self or an ally in range 3 may teleport 2.

Actions.Name: Annihilate
Effects: At round 3+, increase blast size to large blast, and deals 2 piercing damage again to all foes on the battlefield.

Combo.Name: Great Slip
Combo.Description: Remove self from the battlefield, then return in a free space in range 3.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark an unoccupied space in range.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 2 piercing damage twice, and ending this effect.

Actions.Name: Liminal Arrows
Actions.Description: Choose a foe in line of sight and range. At the end of that character's turn, it takes piercing [fray] damage 3 times if not in cover from the [name], or just piercing [fray] damage if it is. Then this effect ends.
